title: The AI winners will recognize that knowledge needs humans
description: In January 2026, Wikipedia will turn 25 years old, a reminder that one of the internet’s most‑visited sites began as an experiment many experts assumed would fail. It grew from a simple idea to more than 65 million articles in over 300 languages not by ignoring criticism, but by listening: adding quality controls, building policies,...
